game.name: INSTALLATION 19
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Alex Carter, part of The Abducted UFO group, acts on a tip about nighttime sightings. Unknowingly, he wanders into a top-secret military base, triggering a suspenseful journey.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Alex Carter, part of The Abducted UFO group, acts on a tip about nighttime sightings. Unknowingly, he wanders into a top-secret military base, triggering a suspenseful journey.
